ResourceHeader.ResourceName: NASA THEMIS GBO Prince George Station
ResourceHeader.Description: Prince George (PGEO) station is located in Prince George, BC, Canada. PGEO is part of the UCLA GBO Network. Magnetic Latitude: 59.8 Magnetic Longitude: 294.40 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 8.8500 Magnetic Declination: 19.72 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the GMAG data
